author: Anonymous Comp
title: metatags
question:
Why do we use these @ symbols such as
(@signature Image -> Image) in order to write signature, etc. in the problem sets and labs, or the auto grader marks them worming, but in the pre recorded lectures, I've seen instructors many times using:
;; Image -> Image for the signature and not using any tags yet the code seems to work? Which method should we follow?
instructor_answer:
;; Image -> Image (i.e. not using tags) was the old method.
Use the tags. It’s what’s provided by (require spd/tags) and is used by the autograder.
The code without the tags will work (i.e. will run) but will not work with the autograder.
